Identification.LongTitle: Regulations Respecting the Importation of Materials from Used or Second-Hand Mattresses

Section.Text: These Regulations may be cited as the Used Mattress Materials Regulations.
Materials from used or second-hand mattresses may be imported only if they

Paragraph.Label: (a)
Paragraph.Text: have been cleaned and fumigated; and

Paragraph.Label: (b)
Paragraph.Text: are accompanied by a certificate that is signed by the exporter or other person having knowledge of such cleaning and fumigation and

Subparagraph.Label: (i)
Subparagraph.Text: gives complete details of the procedure used to clean and fumigate the materials, and

Subparagraph.Label: (ii)
Subparagraph.Text: contains a statement certifying that that procedure was carried out.
